title: Chapter I - Audit Of Revenues And Accounts Payable From State Funds And Funds Under Its Control
content:
Chapter I - Audit Of Revenues And Accounts Payable From State Funds And Funds Under Its Control

State Regulations

Part 1 - General Provisions (§ 1.1 to 1.9)

Part 2 - Repealed

Part 3 - Personal Service (§ 3.1 to 3.25 to 3.26)

Part 4 - Construction And Repair Work (§ 4.1 to 4.19)

Part 5 - Highway And Bridge Work: Construction; Improvement; Maintenance (§ 5.1 to 5.19)

Part 6 - Payments Of Vendor Claims And Statutory Expenditures (§ 6.1 to 6.13)

Part 7 - Purchase Orders, Purchase Contracts, Miscellaneous Service Contracts And Purchase Orders (§ 7.1 to 7.16 to 7.19)

Part 8 - Traveling Expenses (§ 8.0 to 8.17)

Part 9 - Repealed

Part 10 - Repealed

Part 11 - Printing, Binding, Advertising And Reporting Services (§ 11.1 to 11.7 to 11.8)

Part 12 - Real Estate, Leases, Fidelity Bonds And Insurance (§ 12.1 to 12.2)

Part 13 - Acquisition Of Real Estate (§ 13.1 to 13.2)

Part 14 - Revenues And Refunds (§ 14.1 to 14.7 to 14.12)

Part 15 - Collateral Loan Brokers (§ 15.1 to 15.8)

Part 16 - Field Audit (§ 16.1 to 16.21)

Part 17 - Repealed

Part 18 - Prompt Payment Processing (§ 18.1)

Part 19 - Special Payments - Claims For Damages (§ 19.1 to 19.6)

Part 20 - Payment Of Private Counsel Fees For Representation Of A State Employee Pursuant To Section 17 Of The Public Officers Law (§ 20.1 to 20.6)

Part 21 - Repealed

Part 22 - Prompt Contracting And Interest Payments For Not-for-profit Organizations (§ 22.1 to 22.10)

Part 23 - Not-for-profit Short-term Revolving Loan Fund (§ 23.1 to 23.6)

Part 24 - Contract Award Protest Procedure for Contract Awards Subject to the Comptroller's Approval (§ 24.1 to 24.6)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
